Package me.Treidex.GameAPI.Util.Math

Class Vector2

java.lang.Object
me.Treidex.GameAPI.Util.Math.Vector2
public class Vector2
extends java.lang.Object
A Class that stores a 2D Vector.
Author:
Treidex
